usage.cn: 幸福是每一个微小愿望的达成。
usage.eng: Happiness is about having each tiny wish come true.

usage.cn: 每次想到你，我就发现自己是微笑着的。
usage.eng: Every time you come to mind, I realize I'm smiling.

usage.cn: 爱情来得如此之快。你要么冒险一搏，要么遗憾一生
usage.eng: Love comes fast. You either risk it, or you regret it.

usage.cn: 明天和死亡，哪一个先到，我们永远无从知晓，我们拥有的只是现在——藏传佛教
usage.eng: Tomorrow or next life —which comes first, we never know.
